class.name: GDCubismParameter
class.description: Elements contained in the [Array] returned by the _get_parameters_ function of [GDCubismUserModel]. By writing a value to this class's _value_, you can modify the parameter of the Live2D model.

method.name: reset
method.description: Resets the currently set value to [default_value]. The hold status is also lifted.

members.member: The initial value of the parameter held by this class.
The maximum value that can be set for the parameter held by this class.
The minimum value that can be set for the parameter held by this class.
If true, the parameters you set will take precedence even if motion or expression is set.
